short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Display relevant search results from the Obsidian Omnisearch plugin.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Display results as you search directly retrieved from your Obsidian vault. Selecting results will open them inside of Obsidian making search a seamless experience.

Obsidian and the Omnisearch plugin must be installed before this plugin will work. The HTTP server option in Omnisearch settings must also be activated. Ensure the port set in Omnisearch matches the port in your Omnisearch Companion settings.
